title: Learning Quantitative Econ
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Introduction
text: There are too many excellent resources for Quantitative Economics (QE). I am not trying to add one more to it. My objective is just to create a place where I keep an index of QE which I find interesting and which have helped me in this journey. And meanwhile, if someone finds it helpful, no one can be more happy than me!

title: 2  Chapter 1
text: This is the first chapter which I am going to write.
